name: fake-promise
description: Gives full control over when ES6 promises are resolved by providing an implementation of Promise with behavior controlled by .resolve(result) and .reject(error) methods. Intended for use in unit tests.

scripts.compile: npm run compile-coffee && npm run compile-ts
scripts.copy-assets: cp package*.json lib/ && cp README.md lib/ && cp LICENSE lib/
scripts.build: npm run compile && npm test && npm run copy-assets
scripts.clean-build: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.deploy: npm install && npm run clean-build && cd lib && npm publish
